name: Make and Pop
description:
Make & Pop is a pop it game with a twist. Make it by yourself and then pop it! This was a one day Project Game Instructions
  1. Left click to place a bubble and right click to remove a bubble during editing. To change the color of the bubble during editing, go to options.
  2. To play, click on the play button after which clicking on a bubble will burst them!

 

Showcase Video -  Made By DiceFlip Games
